metadata.name: New BITS Job Created Via PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new bits job by PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM scheduled_job_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND metadata.event_code = 3 AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new bits job by PowerShell

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrator PowerShell scripts Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1197/T1197.md
